name: The City By Night (frogmaticgames)
description:
The City By Night is a 1920’s Noir style RPG set in San Francisco.  The player takes on jobs as a private investigator and solves them in their own style — through charm, stealth, brute force, and more!

Fend off Hunger, Exhaustion, and the creeping Dread of the job as you try to take on enough jobs the pay the rent and live to see another day.

~ IMPORTANT: The City By Night is in very early Alpha Stage. Lots of bugs and little content.  By purchasing, you will gain access to all future updates and are helping the developer build a unique and engaging game. ~

Key Concepts:

  • Explore 1920’s San Francisco as a Private Investigator
  • Manage your Hunger, Exhaustion, and Dread as you explore the seedy underbelly of the city
  • Uncover a dark web of influence and power while trying to make ends meet

Planned Features

  • Use persuade, charm, or intimidate to shakedown characters, not just brute force
  • Different types of jobs: blackmail, murder investigation, robbery, protection
  • It's easy to die if you aren't careful! Continue the investigation where you left off with a new investigator.
  • Evidence is chained through multiple locations and characters
  • Able to go into buildings and visit famous landmarks
  • Use your residence to research clues or rest and recharge your exhaustion
  • Upgrade your digs with the money you earn
